331:1: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako'napekṣaḥ kāye jīvite ca,
331:15: tāṃśca anyāṃśca sarvabodhisattvaguṇān saṃpaśyan anupūrveṇa yena pṛthurāṣṭraṃ janapadastenopasaṃkramya utpalabhūtiṃ gāndhikaśreṣṭhinaṃ parimārgan parigaveṣamāṇo'drākṣīt|
331:17: upetya utpalabhūtergāndhikaśreṣṭhinaḥ pādau sirasābhivandya utpalabhūtiṃ gāndhikaśreṣṭhinamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya utpalabhūtergāndhikaśreṣṭhinaḥ purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha-ahamārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitaḥ sarvabuddhasamajñānamākāṅkṣamāṇaḥ sarvabuddhapūrṇapraṇidhānamaṇḍalaṃ paripūrayitukāmaḥ sarvabuddharūpakāyaṃ draṣṭukāmaḥ sarvabuddhadharmakāyaṃ pariniṣpādayitukāmaḥ sarvabuddhadharmajñānakāyaṃ parijñātukāmaḥ sarvabodhisattvacaryāmaṇḍalaṃ pariśodhayitukāmaḥ sarvabodhisattvasamādhimaṇḍalamavabhāsayitukāmaḥ sarvabodhisattvadhāraṇīmaṇḍalaṃ saṃsthāpayitukāmaḥ sarvāvaraṇamaṇḍalaṃ vikaritukāmaḥ sarvakṣetramaṇḍalamanuvicaritukāmaḥ|
331:18: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
331:25: sarvānulepanāni sarvānulepanayogān sarvacūrṇān sarvacūrṇayogān sarvagandhānulepanacūrṇākarān prajānāmi|
331:43: saṃbhavato'pi utpādato'pi prādurbhāvato'pi pariniṣpattito'pi pariśuddhito'pi parihārato'pi prayogato'pi paribhogato'pi viṣayato'pi prabhāvato'pi dharmato'pi mūlato'pi prajānāmi||
331:44: asti kulaputra manuṣyaloke nāgasaṃkṣobhasaṃbhavahastigarbho nāma gandhaḥ,
331:45: yasya tilamātrā gulikā sakalaṃ pṛthurāṣṭraṃ janapadaṃ mahāgandhaghanābhrajālasaṃchannaṃ kṛtvā saptāhaṃ sūkṣmagandhodakadhārāvarṣamabhipravarṣati|
331:46: tatra yeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ śarīre vā cīvare vā gandhodakadhārā nipatanti,
331:50: ye'pi sattvāsteṣāṃ gandhameghajālānāṃ mārutasamīritānāmantarbhavanagatā gandhaṃ jighranti,
331:53: na caiṣāṃ śarīre vyādhirutpadyate dhātusaṃkṣobhajo vā aparaparikramiko vā|
331:55: na samudācarati bhayaṃ vā trāsaṃ vā cchambhitattvaṃ vā manaḥsaṃkṣobho vā vyāpādo vā|
331:56: sarve ca te sattvā anyonyaṃ maitracittā bhavanti harṣaprītisaṃjātāḥ|
331:57: teṣāmahaṃ kulaputra harṣaprītisaṃjātānāmāśayaviśuddhimārabhya tathā dharmaṃ deśayāmi,
331:59: asti kulaputra malayaparvatasaṃbhavaṃ gośīrṣaṃ nāma candanam,
331:61: asti kulaputra sāgarakacchasaṃbhavo aparājito nāma gandhaḥ,
331:62: yenānuliptāyā bheryāḥ śaṅkhasya vā nirghoṣeṇa sarvaparacakraṃ parājayaṃ gacchati|
331:63: asti kulaputra anavataptahṛdatīrasaṃbhavaṃ padmagarbhaṃ nāma kālāgaru,
331:64: yasya tilamātrā gulikā sakalaṃ jambudvīpaṃ gandhena spharati|
331:67: asti kulaputra himavatparvatarājasaṃbhavā aruṇavatī nāma gandhajātiḥ,
331:71: asti kulaputra rākṣasalokasaṃbhavā sāgaragarbhā nāma gandhajātiḥ,
331:73: yayā dhūpitamātrayā caturaṅgo balakāyo rājñaścakravartino gaganatale pratiṣṭhate|
331:79: teṣāmupasaṃkrāntānāṃ suyāmo devarājo dhārmīṃ kathāṃ kathayati|
331:80: asti kulaputra tuṣitabhavane sindhuvāritā nāma gandhajātiḥ,
331:81: yā dharmāsananiṣaṇṇasya ekajātipratibaddhasya bodhisattvasya purato dhūpitā mahāgandhameghena sakalaṃ dharmadhātuṃ spharitvā sarvatathāgataparṣanmaṇḍaleṣvanekākāravyūhaṃ mahādharmameghavarṣaṃ pravarṣati|
331:82: asti kulaputra sunirmitadevarājabhavane manoharā nāma gandhajātiḥ,
331:85: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ nirāmagandhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvakāmoccalitānāṃ kleśamārapāśavipramuktānāṃ sarvabhavagativyativṛttānāṃ jñānamāyāgatarūpavicāriṇāṃ sarvalokānupaliptānāmasaṅgaśīlānāmanāvaraṇajñānamaṇḍalaviśuddhānāmapratihatajñānagocaraviṣayāṇāṃ sarvālayaniketāniśritānāṃ sarvabhavālayaniketacāriṇāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum,
331:94: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidāraka utpalabhūtergāndhikaśreṣṭhinaḥ pādau śirasābhivandya utpalabhūtiṃ gāndhikaśreṣṭhinamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya utpalabhūtergāndhikaśreṣṭhino'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ||22||
